meanings.definition: The area of the body beneath the arm.
meanings.sent1: She felt a tickle in her underarm.
meanings.sent2: He applied deodorant to his underarm before going out.
meanings.sent3: The ticklish underarm made her giggle during the tickling game.
meanings.sent4: Her underarm was a hidden treasure trove of secrets.
meanings.sent5: The underarm was a cozy spot for the kitten to snuggle in.

meanings.definition: A throw made with the arm below shoulder level.
meanings.sent1: The pitcher's underarm was sore from all the throws.
meanings.sent2: He practiced his underarm technique for the softball game.
meanings.sent3: The underarm throw surprised the opponent with its accuracy.
meanings.sent4: Her underarm throw was as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The underarm toss sailed gracefully through the air.
